eventdesc: 05/06/2025 -- Harmony Hacks was honored and recognized as a new CSTEM student organization at CSUSM.
04/25/2025 -- Celebrated graduating members by decorating grad caps, creating vision boards, and passing out Harmony Hacks graduation cords.
04/19/2025 -- Day 2 of our First Annual Harmony Hackathon! Students finished up their projects and got the opportunity to present to a panel of judges. Hackathon awards were presented.
04/12/2025 -- Day 1 of our First Annual Harmony Hackathon! Students received the assignment details, met their groups, and began working on their projects.
04/10/2025 -- In-person resume feedback, tips, and tricks, with guest speaker Moses Maddox. Members learned how to optimize their resumes for recruiters.
03/08/2025 -- Boothed for CSUSM's Super Stem Saturday event and ran a Magic Milk experiment!
02/11/2025 --  Fun Galentine's day event inluding coloring pages, valentine cards, and crafts.
01/30/2025 -- New member recruitment at the bi-annual Student Organization Fair.
